casebody.data:
R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO COMPANY, et al, petitioners,
v.
Robert SURY, as Personal Representative of the Estate of William Sury. No. 13-1192. Supreme Court of the United States June 9, 2014. Case below, 118 So.3d 849 . Petition for writ of certiorari to the District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District, denied.
